headline: WORLD FACING FOOD FAMINE, SAY WAR ENVOYS; Imperative That United States Rush Shipbuilding in Order to Feed Europe. CABINET WEIGHS SITUATION Washington Realizes That Even an Early Peace Would Not Lift Our Burden. GERMAN POOR STARVING French Visitors Report that 20,000,000 in German Cities Are in Grave Distress. Must Rush Shipbuilding. 20,000,000 Germans Starving. WORLD FACES FOOD FAMINE, ENVOYS SAY Well Posted on Allied Supplies. Peril in a Separate Peace. Viviani's Persuasive Power. Must Act Quickly. Put German Ships at Work. SURPRISED AT OUR NAVY. French Envoys "Had No Idea That It Was So Magnificent." He's "Papa" Jeffre at Home. CUBA WANTS WAR FUNDS. Minister Hevia Here to Pave the Way for Full Co-operation.
